micro_ecc module usage guide
Brief:           This module is 3rd party open source and is migrated from micro_ecc.
Usage:           GCC:  1) In your GCC project Makefile, please add the following:
                     include $(SOURCE_DIR)/middleware/third_party/micro_ecc/module.mk
                       2) Add the following to include paths:
                     middleware/third_party/micro_ecc/inc
Dependency:      NONE
Notice:          NONE
Relative doc:    For more information, please refer to https://github.com/kmackay/micro-ecc
Example project: Please find the project earbuds_ref_design or headset_ref_design under the project folder.
